title: Issue with Rakan..... really?
body:
SOoooooooo why the F*** does Rakan's AAs not count as Melee???

Just tried using Relic Shield on him only to find out that it is utterly useless, as it doesn't proc the execute. 

So explain to me how Thresh can proc the execute when Rakan can not, and Thresh has longer (Ill say that again) LONGER range than Rakan.

WTF? Why????

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=420 grams,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BErl15Gs,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-04-21T04:40:18.034+0000)
>
> Thresh doesn't proc it

Last time I did it, it did proc when I went into melee range.

Nah he's ranged, it's just really, really short. It's still like twice the range of your typical melee though.

And no, Thresh cannot proc Relic Shield's execute. He is ranged too, and it must be a melee attack to proc the execute damage, though anyone can proc the heal/gold share by last hitting in any way.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BErl15Gs,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-04-21T04:08:51.400+0000)
>
> Nah he's ranged, it's just really, really short. It's still like twice the range of your typical melee though.
> 
> And no, Thresh cannot proc Relic Shield's execute. He is ranged too, and it must be a melee attack to proc the execute damage, though anyone can proc the heal/gold share by last hitting in any way.

Actually point blank from thresh procs it. (When he's holding the hook, not swinging the chain)
Only the animation changes, but the attacks are still coded as ranged. Same with Fiddlesticks.
It doesn't work like that. You're either ranged or you're melee, getting closer doesn't change your attacks to melee.

For everyone who says that Thresh can't proc the relic shield. How then i have played Thresh only with relic shield and i was good? Thresh is ranged champs, yes, but abilityes proc the effect, too. Then you know how Thresh works with that? With the passive of his E. 

Don't thank me

And becouse Rakan doesn't have such a buff on AA he can't.
By "proc the relic shield" they mean the free 200-400 true damage passive(which makes last hitting minions way easier), not the gold sharing. The gold sharing happens by everyone.
Thresh is a pimp and he can use whatever he wants with any range he wants.
